71  enum {
72  RIGHT = 0,
73  DOWN = MG_TRIG_POINTS/4,
74  LEFT = MG_TRIG_POINTS/2,
75  UP = MG_TRIG_POINTS*3/4,
76  QUARTER_CLOCKWISE = MG_TRIG_POINTS/4,
77  QUARTER_COUNTER_CLOCKWISE = -MG_TRIG_POINTS/4,
78  EIGHTH_CLOCKWISE = MG_TRIG_POINTS/8,
79  EIGHTH_COUNTER_CLOCKWISE = -MG_TRIG_POINTS/8,
80  };
81 
83  inline void set(enum sys_gfx gfx, u8 thickness = 3, i16 rotation = 0){
84  _gfx = gfx; _thickness = thickness; _rotation = rotation;
85  }
86 
88  inline void set_thickness(u8 thickness){ _thickness = thickness; }
90  inline void set_gfx(enum sys_gfx gfx){ _gfx = gfx; }
92  inline void set_rotation(i16 rotation){ _rotation = rotation; }
93 
95  inline enum sys_gfx gfx() const { return _gfx; }
97  inline u8 thickness() const { return _thickness; }
99  inline i16 rotation() const { return _rotation; }
100 
101 private:
102  enum sys_gfx _gfx;
103  u8 _thickness;
104  i16 _rotation;
105 };
